meta.label: Edit fuzzy join matches
meta.description: Webapp to edit matches of a fuzzy join between a reference and an external dataset.
meta.comments: icon must be one of the FontAwesome 3.2.1 icons, complete list here at https://fontawesome.com/v3.2.1/icons/

params.name: ref_key
params.label: Unique key for reference dataset
params.description: Select a column to use as a unique identifier for rows

params.name: ext_key
params.label: Unique key for external dataset
params.description: Select a column to use as a unique identifier for rows
